Heather Watland
===============

![Heather Watland](https://www.arlingtonwa.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=14315)



Heather Watland, Position 3
---------------------------

Email
[Heather Watland](mailto:hwatland@arlingtonwa.gov)

Elected January 1, 2026 - December 31, 2029

Heather has worked in the field of education with the Arlington School District since 2023.

* Northwest Cosmetology School (2012)

Heather and her husband, Dakin, are long-time members of the Arlington community and met while attending Arlington High School. Following Dakin’s service in the U.S. Army, the couple married in 2013. They are the proud parents of two sons, Bentley and Easton, both of whom attend schools within the Arlington School District.

In her free time, Heather enjoys camping, hiking, fishing, and line dancing with Lady Di Dancin’. Above all, she values spending quality time and creating lasting memories with her family.

* Vice President, Gleneagle Homeowners Association (2023–Present)
* City of Arlington Park Arts and Recreation Commission (2024–2025)
